segments.text: Now , madam , here is the Hotel .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: The fare is different from the meter .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Well , madam , the meter was not on at all . You didn't tell me .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: But I thought it was . Anyway . I am in a hurry . Here is the money .
segments.speaker: S2
